statements: SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_count, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count < 1000;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_name DESC, population_count ASC
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count > 1000
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status = 'endangered'
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE population_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT DISTINCT conservation_status FROM endangered_species
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_trend FROM endangered_species;
SELECT * FROM population_data;
SELECT year, population_size FROM population_data;
SELECT population_size, year FROM population_data;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, population_trend FROM endangered_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'E%' ORDER BY population_trend DESC;
SELECT species_name, year, population_size FROM population_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC, population_size ASC;

SELECT population_data.species_id, species_name, population_size FROM population_data JOIN endangered_species ON population_data.species_id = endangered_species.species_id WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT species_id, AVG(population_size) AS avg_population FROM population_data GROUP BY species_id HAVING avg_population > 5000 ORDER BY avg_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_count, conservation_status FROM endangered_species ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM population_trends WHERE year >= 2015;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM endangered_species JOIN species_habitat ON endangered_species.species_id = species_habitat.species_id WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM endangered_species JOIN species_habitat ON endangered_species.species_id = species_habitat.species_id;
SELECT species_name, year, population_change FROM endangered_species JOIN population_trends ON endangered_species.species_id = population_trends.species_id WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT DISTINCT conservation_status FROM endangered_species;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT habitat_type, habitat_area FROM habitat_data ORDER BY habitat_area DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT action_name, action_date FROM conservation_actions WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population FROM endangered_species WHERE population > 1000;
SELECT habitat_type, habitat_area FROM habitat_data ORDER BY habitat_area DESC;

SELECT conservation_actions.action_name, conservation_actions.action_date, endangered_species.species_name FROM conservation_actions JOIN endangered_species ON conservation_actions.species_id = endangered_species.species_id;
SELECT conservation_status, COUNT(*) FROM endangered_species GROUP BY conservation_status;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT population_estimate, year FROM PopulationTrends ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT species_id, habitat_type, habitat_area FROM Habitat WHERE habitat_area > 100;
SELECT classification_id, kingdom, phylum, class FROM SpeciesClassification ORDER BY classification_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY population_size DESC;

SELECT EndangeredSpecies.species_name, PopulationTrends.year, PopulationTrends.population_estimate FROM EndangeredSpecies INNER JOIN PopulationTrends ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = PopulationTrends.species_id WHERE PopulationTrends.year = 2021;
SELECT Habitat.habitat_type, SUM(Habitat.habitat_area) AS total_area FROM Habitat GROUP BY Habitat.habitat_type;

SELECT SpeciesClassification.kingdom, COUNT(SpeciesClassification.kingdom) AS species_count FROM SpeciesClassification INNER JOIN EndangeredSpecies ON SpeciesClassification.species_id = EndangeredSpecies.species_id GROUP BY SpeciesClassification.kingdom HAVING COUNT(SpeciesClassification.kingdom) > 1;
